statement.name: final
statement.parts: SELECT T1.TENPOLC_KBN ,T1.SYUKKAKAISYA_CD ,M1.MEISYO_NM AS SYUKKAKAISYA_NM ,T1.SYUKKATEN_CD ,M2.TENPO_NM AS SYUKKATEN_NM ,T1.SCM_CD ,T1.DENPYO_BANGO ,T1.SYUKKA_YMD ,T1.NYUKAYOTEIGOKEI_SU ,CASE WHEN T1.IDORIYU_KB = 1 THEN '○' ELSE '' END AS KYAKUCYU ,CASE WHEN T1.IDORIYU_KB = 2 THEN '○' ELSE '' END AS NEGAKI FROM MDNT0010 T1 LEFT JOIN MDMT0100 M1 ON M1.SIKIBETSU_CD = 'KASY' AND M1.MEISYO_CD = T1.SYUKKAKAISYA_CD LEFT JOIN BOMT0010_ALL M2 ON M2.KAISYA_CD = T1.SYUKKAKAISYA_CD AND M2.TENPO_CD = T1.SYUKKATEN_CD WHERE 0=0

statement.name: final
statement.parts: ORDER BY T1.TENPOLC_KBN , T1.SYUKKAKAISYA_CD , T1.SYUKKATEN_CD , T1.DENPYO_BANGO
